title: Ticket #4826: Some DAGMan parameters are missing from param_info.in
description:
There are a bunch of DAGMan-related parameters that aren't in param_info.in. I can't see any rhyme or reason for which ones are in and which are out, and TJ says they should all be in the file:

All fixed-name params should be in param_info.in. We don't currently have a good way to handle constructed names. Whether or not they have default values in param_info.in depends on how important it is to have no value, since it's a bit of a pain for a user to turn off default values from param_info.in.
remarks:
2015-Feb-27 15:46:24 by wenger:
Wow, quite a mess.

These are in the code but not documented:

  • DAGMAN_CONFIG_FILE
  • DAGMAN_DEFAULT_PRIORITY
  • DAGMAN_OLD_RESCUE

These are in the code but not in param_info.in:

  • DAGMAN_ALLOW_LOG_ERROR
  • DAGMAN_ALWAYS_RUN_POST
  • DAGMAN_ALWAYS_USE_NODE_LOG
  • DAGMAN_COPY_TO_SPOOL
  • DAGMAN_DEBUG
  • DAGMAN_DEBUG_CACHE_SIZE
  • DAGMAN_DEFAULT_NODE_LOG
  • DAGMAN_DEFAULT_PRIORITY
  • DAGMAN_GENERATE_SUBDAG_SUBMITS
  • DAGMAN_HOLD_CLAIM_TIME
  • DAGMAN_MAX_JOB_HOLDS
  • DAGMAN_MAX_JOBS_IDLE
  • DAGMAN_MAX_JOBS_SUBMITTED
  • DAGMAN_MAX_POST_SCRIPTS
  • DAGMAN_MAX_PRE_SCRIPTS
  • DAGMAN_MAX_RESCUE_NUM
  • DAGMAN_MAX_SUBMIT_ATTEMPTS
  • DAGMAN_MAX_SUBMITS_PER_INTERVAL
  • DAGMAN_PEGASUS_REPORT_METRICS
  • DAGMAN_PEGASUS_REPORT_TIMEOUT
  • DAGMAN_SUBMIT_DELAY
  • DAGMAN_SUPPRESS_NOTIFICATION
  • DAGMAN_USE_OLD_DAG_READER
  • DAGMAN_USER_LOG_SCAN_INTERVAL
  • DAGMAN_USE_STRICT
  • DAGMAN_VERBOSITY
  • DAGMAN_WRITE_PARTIAL_RESCUE

This is in param_info.in but not in the code:

  • DAGMAN_DELETE_OLD_LOGS

2015-Feb-27 16:30:12 by wenger:
When this gets merged to master it needs to get updated because the default for DAGMAN_MAX_JOBS_IDLE is now 1000, not 0, in 8.3...

2015-Mar-06 17:56:11 by wenger:
Note: I created V8_2-gittrac_4826-branch for this.

2015-Mar-31 11:44:01 by wenger:
When this gets merged to master, DAGMAN_STORK_SUBMIT_EXE and DAGMAN_STORK_RM_EXE will also need to get removed from the param table.

Also, TJ suggested leaving in obsolete parameters and adding an "obsolete=true" line, but this caused problems. Also, just commenting out the obsolete ones breaks the build (apparently you can't have more than one comment line in a row). So I'm just removing the obsolete ones from the param table entirely...

2015-Mar-31 15:04:26 by wenger:
Everything is (hopefully) done except for some of the documentation; so I'm going to assign this to TJ for code review while I finish up the docs.

2015-Apr-03 11:14:49 by johnkn:
CODE_REVIEW: path params in param_info.in that point to executables should have a win32_default that appends the .exe.

other than that, thc code looks good.

2015-Apr-03 16:14:54 by wenger:
This has been merged: V8_2-gittrac_4826-branch -> V8_2_8-branch -> V8_3_5-branch (updated for previous 8.3 changes) -> master.
